library.description:
Negative array index support using ES6 Proxy.

var a=[1,2,3]; a[-1] //=> 3
library.name: negative-array

library.description: A text highlighter intended for every use case. Has built-in options for diacritics, separate word search, synonyms, iframes, filters, accuracy, element, class name and more. Can be used with pure JavaScript or as jQuery plugin.
library.name: mark.js

library.description: Continuum is a next-generation JavaScript (ES6) Virtual Machine written in last generation JavaScript (ES3). It assembles bytecode from sourcecode and executes it an ES6 runtime environment.
library.name: Continuum

library.description: Easy communication between cross-origin browser tabs
library.name: across-tabs
